title: The slums which have been declared and notified as ―SLUMS‖ by the Competent Authority under the prov
clause_text: The slums which have been declared and notified as ―SLUMS‖ by the Competent Authority under the provisions of the Maharashtra Slum Areas (Improvement, Clearance and Redevelopment) Act, 1971, as well as; Any area which, the Competent Authority may declare as ―Slum Rehabilitation Area‖ as per the provision contained in Section 3-C of the Slum Act 1971; and also
section: Provisions of the said Regulations shall be applicable to :

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
